description: Break down large statistics.ts file (787 LOC) into smaller, focused modules under 300 LOC each

workstreams.description: Analyze file structure and identify logical groupings
Create shared types file for all statistics interfaces
Extract enrollment statistics hooks to separate module
Extract health statistics hooks to separate module
Extract activity and risk statistics to separate module
Extract compliance statistics hooks to separate module
Extract dashboard and composite hooks to separate module
Extract trend and comparative analytics to separate module
Create index.ts for backward compatibility with re-exports
Verify all files under 300 LOC and backward compatibility

decisions.decision: Split into 7 focused modules: types, enrollment, health, activity-risk, compliance, dashboard, analytics
decisions.rationale: Original file has 787 LOC. Breaking into focused modules keeps each under 300 LOC and improves maintainability

decisions.decision: Created 9 files total: 7 module files + index.ts + default.ts
decisions.rationale: All files under 300 LOC (max 179 LOC). Maintained full backward compatibility via index.ts re-exports
